org.sindice.siren.analysis

Class AnyURIAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
      • org.sindice.siren.analysis.AnyURIAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class AnyURIAnalyzer
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
    Analyzer designed to deal with any kind of URIs and perform some post-processing on URIs.

    The URI normalisation can be configured using setUriNormalisation(URINormalisation). You can disable it, activate it only on URI local name, or on the full URI. However, URI normalisation on the full URI is costly in term of CPU at indexing time, and can double the size of the index, since each URI is duplicated by n tokens. By default, the URI normalisation is disabled.

    See Also:
    URINormalisationFilter, URILocalnameFilter
